message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and provide exceptional value. For this unique opportunity, I propose a price of $120. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value your product provides. I would like to counteroffer at $95. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $105. This reflects the value I place on the product and I believe it's a fair compromise.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $100, which is the maximum I am willing to pay for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
